DOC.brief_title: The Effect Decreasing Inspired Oxygen Concentration Post-Operative Oxygenation After Primary Lobectomy
DOC.detailed_description: One lung ventilation frequently require thoracic surgery result decrease lung function post-operatively . Supra-physiologic oxygen level surgery may contribute decrease lung function worsen lung injury intra-operatively . This study include patient undergoing surgery remove lung lobe require one lung ventilation . The patient divide two group experimental group receive 60 % oxygen air mixture control group receive 100 % oxygen . The two group compare use measure lung function ( ratio partial pressure oxygen arterial blood inspire oxygen concentration ) blood level protein correlate lung injury ( receptor advance glycation end product RAGE ) .
